goal: Fix bug where TypeScript method parameter validation fails because _validate_method_parameters doesn't handle dict format parameters (introduced in Task-077)
description: The _validate_method_parameters function assumes parameters are strings, but TypeScript validator returns dicts with 'name' and 'type' keys. Fix it to handle both formats like _validate_function does.

contains.name: _validate_method_parameters
contains.description: Validate method parameters match expectations, handling both dict format (new) and string format (legacy)
